definition: to turn over/to flip over/to overturn/to rummage through/to translate/to decode/to double/to climb over or into/to cross

home/family/(polite) my (sister, uncle etc)/classifier for families or businesses/refers to the philosophical schools of pre-Han China/noun suffix for a specialist in some activity, such as a musician or revolutionary, corresponding to English -ist, -er, -ary or -ian/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: Wang Zuoliang was not only an English literature scholar, but a great translator as well.
sentences.chinese: 王佐良是研究英國文學的著名學者和優秀的翻譯家。

sentences.english: Overseas scholars praised it as a masterpiece by two female translators ' cooperation.
sentences.chinese: 海外學界盛讚此書爲兩位傑出的女翻譯家合作的結果。

sentences.english: Yeah, Xuanzang was a great translator in Chinese history.
sentences.chinese: 對，玄奘是中國歷史上偉大的翻譯家。

sentences.english: Fu Lei is well known that he is one of great translators in 20th Century in China.
sentences.chinese: 傅雷是公認的20世紀中國最偉大的翻譯家之一。

sentences.english: So did Luxun and Fulei, who were great translators too.
sentences.chinese: 同爲大翻譯家的魯迅與傅雷也是如此。

sentences.english: Vladimir Nabokov is not only a wellknown novelist but also an influential translator.
sentences.chinese: 納博科夫既是著名的小說家，又是出色的翻譯家。

sentences.english: You need to stand the acid test before you can become a translater .
sentences.chinese: 你必須通過嚴格的考試，才能成爲翻譯家。

sentences.english: As a distinguished translator, Professor Xu Yuanchong is quite versatile.
sentences.chinese: 作爲一名翻譯家，許淵衝先生的成就是多方面的。

sentences.english: It is difficult to be a good translator.
sentences.chinese: 當一名優秀翻譯家相當難。

sentences.english: Yang Jiang, Chinese writer and noted translator, with Don Quixote among her translation works.
sentences.chinese: 楊絳，作家，翻譯家，譯著包括《堂吉柯德》。

sentences.english: Renowned Chinese literature translator Yang Xianyi passed away last week.
sentences.chinese: 中國著名翻譯家楊憲益上週逝世。

sentences.english: As printers sought new products, translations took off.
sentences.chinese: 當印刷工人尋覓着新產品，翻譯家也起飛了。

sentences.english: Tu An, a native from Changzhou, Jiangsu Province, was born in 1923.
sentences.chinese: 屠岸，江蘇常州人，1923年生，詩人，翻譯家。

pinyin: Zhong1 yang1 Xi4 ju4 Xue2 yuan4

definition: Lai Shengchuan (1954-), US-Taiwanese dramatist and director

pinyin: Pu3 lin2 si1 dun4 Da4 xue2
